snippet: Wall Street rose on the last day of 2013, joining global stock markets that were closing out at or near record highs.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street rose on the last day of 2013, joining global stock markets that were closing out at or near record highs.

headline.main: S.& P. Up 30% in Year in Biggest Increase Since 1997
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Closes Out Year on Upswing
